name: Camisole Top >Customizable Colors< ꔫ (LoRA)
description:
Heyo /ᐠ. .ᐟ\ฅ !! another clothing Lora for you guys hehe ♡⸝⸝ If any of you want to see a certain piece of clothing pls do recommend in the discussion section <3 !

I used ChillOutMix to train and produce some of the images !! ^^

Please use Size: 512x1024 or a higher height then width (you'll get cropped images if you don't)

I recommend keeping the weight between (0.8-0.5) and using the negative prompts as needed !! Higher weights tend to heavily sway the images output to the original dataset so I recommend lower weights if your okay with losing the original style a bit !!

Important Trigger word Info (pls read)

Cute_Camisole_Top trigger is essential to getting the exact style of the images above !!!

  1. Beige00 (Dirty white color)

  2. Blue02

  3. Green03

  4. White04

Some known issues are colors mixing, the bottoms always reverting to being blue jeans, and shirt slightly changing style the lower the weight you go or depending on the Lora you combine mine with !!

If you add prompts like (huge breasts:1.2), Cleavage, Large breast and such you'll get a lower neck for the shirt ! ^^

Please also use these negative prompt ((jeans)), ((cropped)) if you wanna get a different type of bottom !!

So that's all the colors! I mainly put this here so there's no confusion (ෆ˙ᵕ˙ෆ)♡

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Please use negative prompt Embedding (Easy Negative) it works a lot better with it then without it !! I've noticed many issues with odd hands as well so you can also use Bad-Hands-5 !!

I also highly recommend using the inpaint face trick to fix the faces !!

This Lora also works kind of well in combination with other Lora's ! you may have to lower the strength of my Lora if you wanna get the full likeness of the specific person !!

Please be kind with this Lora ♡

modelVersions.name: Cute_Camisole_Top_V1
modelVersions.description:
I highly recommend using the trigger word Cute_Camisole_Top.

Please use Size: 512x1024 or a higher height then width (you'll get cropped images if you don't)

I recommend keeping the weight between (0.8-0.5) and using the negative prompts as needed !! Higher weights tend to heavily sway the images output to the original dataset so I recommend lower weights if your okay with losing the original style a bit !!

Some known issues are colors mixing, the bottoms always reverting to being blue jeans, and shirt slightly changing style the lower the weight you go or depending on the Lora you combine mine with !!

If you add prompts like (huge breasts:1.2), Cleavage, Large breast and such you'll get a lower neck for the shirt ! ^^

Please also use these negative prompt ((jeans)), ((cropped)) if you wanna get a different type of bottom !!

I also highly recommend using the inpaint face trick to fix the faces !!

Here are all the settings used for most the examples:

Size: 512x1024

Clip skip: 2

no hires upscale this time around ^^

If you have any issues please tell me and ill try and help !! ૮₍ ˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶ ₎ა
